dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Cinchona{/it}) of South American trees and shrubs of the madder family
{bc}the dried bark of a cinchona (such as {it}C. ledgeriana{/it}) containing alkaloids (such as quinine) and formerly used as a specific in malaria

et: New Latin, genus name, from the countess of {it}Chinchón{/it} †1641 wife of the Peruvian viceroy
shortdef: any of a genus (Cinchona) of South American trees and shrubs of the madder family
the dried bark of a cinchona (such as C. ledgeriana) containing alkaloids (such as quinine) and formerly used as a specific in malaria
